## TinySynqOptionsBase.logOptions property

Configure logging options.

**Signature:**

```typescript
logOptions?: ISettingsParam<ILogObj>;
```

## Remarks

TinySynq uses TSLog for logging. All optiions are passed directly to it. See https://tslog.js.org/\#/?id=settings for details
